meanings.definition: The quality of being fearless or determined in the face of difficulty or danger.
meanings.sent1: Her dauntlessness in standing up to the bully inspired others to be brave.
meanings.sent2: His dauntlessness during the storm saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed dauntlessness in trying to steal nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The dauntlessness of the firefighter rushing into the burning building was truly heroic.
meanings.sent5: The dauntlessness of the mountain climber facing the treacherous peak was admirable.

meanings.definition: The act of showing courage or bravery in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent1: The dauntlessness of the knight in battle was legendary.
meanings.sent2: She displayed dauntlessness when confronting her fears.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's dauntlessness in chasing a much larger dog was comical.
meanings.sent4: His dauntlessness in pursuing his dreams was like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The dauntlessness of the marathon runner crossing the finish line was inspiring.
